metadata.title: CVE-2011-3744 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low
metadata.description: HTML Purifier 4.2.0 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive informationvia a direct request to a .php file, which reveals the installation path inan error message, as demonstrated by tests/PHPT/Reporter/SimpleTest.php andcertain other files.

criterions.comment: php-htmlpurifier package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
